description.db:para: This table is used to provision Short Message Service Center (SMSC) information to connect to over the SMPP (Short Message Peer-to-Peer). More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;proto_smpp.html.

column.name: name
column.description: An arbitrary name of the SMSC, used to uniquely identify the binding.

column.name: ip
column.description: The IP address used to connect to the SMSC.

column.name: port
column.description: The port used to connect to the SMSC.

column.name: system_id
column.description: The System ID (also called user name) for the gateway to use when connecting to the SMPP server.

column.name: password
column.description: The password for the gateway to use when connecting to the SMPP server.

column.name: system_type
column.description: Configures the System Type parameter of the the SMPP server.

column.name: src_ton
column.description: Specifies the Source TON (Type of Number).

column.name: src_npi
column.description: Specifies the Source NPI (Numbering Plan Indicator).

column.name: dst_ton
column.description: Specifies the Destination TON (Type of Number).

column.name: dst_npi
column.description: Specifies the Destination NPI (Numbering Plan Indicator).

column.name: session_type
column.description: Specifies the type of binding: 1 - transciever, 2 - transmitter, 3 - receiver, 4 - outbind.
